room_title: Escape room "Enigmista" by Escape Reality in Las Vegas
room_description:
There have been reports that there is a serial killer on the loose. Many people in the area have gone missing and no traces of their whereabouts have been discovered. Only one survivor has lived to tell the tale of what happened the killers' lair. Rumour has it that he forces his prisoners to perform ghastly tests to see how far they can push themselves in order to escape.
You have suddenly awoken to discover that you have been locked inside a room of complete darkness with no recollection of how you found yourselves in this situation. Your captor has devised a series of games to test how much strength you have to save your own lives.
